name: easy-mssql
description: This is a simple and easy to use mssql library for node.js

scripts.test: npm run test-ts && npm run test-js
scripts.update-in-windows: npm run uninstall-in-windows && update-modules && npm i && npm audit fix
scripts.update-in-linux: npm run uninstall-in-linux && update-modules && npm i && npm audit fix
scripts.uninstall-in-windows: rmdir node_modules /s /q && del package-lock.json && npm i update-modules@latest
scripts.uninstall-in-linux: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i update-modules@latest
